Name: Chocolat a l'orange (Orange Chocolate)
Ingredients: 10 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into a large brandy balloon over a chunk of block ice.
Review: Cognac stirred with aromatised wine, rich orange liqueur with subtle chocolate, cinnamon and zesty orange.
History: Adapted from a 2015 recipe by Jan Kosler at The Celtic Manor Resort, Coldra Woods, The Usk Valley, Wales. Jan’s original recipe calls for Martell XO Cognac.
